summary: This quick and simple MOD adds more and different manholes to solitude-city
descriptionHtml:
This quick and simple MOD adds more and different manholes to solitude-city.

I made this MOD because i never could decide me between the many great manhole-texture-MODs on the nexus.

Furthermore i think because solitude is the only city in skyrim with a sewerage their citizen are very proud of that so they deserve more and better looking manholes...

I've place four additional manholes to solitude so all together there are eight manholes.
These manholes also assigned to different meshes/textures so there are four different manhole-types (please refer manholes-map under images).


This MOD contains only plugin and meshes, no textures !!
You have to download some of the manhole-texture-MODs from the nexus and install them in the following way:

Manhole-Type 1 (merchants district):
Download first manhole-MOD (i use [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58959]Gamwich's[/url]) and rename their textures to smanhole01.dds / smanhole01_n.dds

Manhole-Type 2 (residential district):
Download second manhole-MOD (i use EWI's (no longer available on nexus; maybe alternative use [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58591]this one[/url])) and rename their textures to smanhole02.dds / smanhole02_n.dds

Manhole-Type 3 (blue palace area):
Download third manhole-MOD (i use [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/64308]pfuscher's[/url]) and rename their textures to smanhole03.dds / smanhole03_n.dds

Manhole-Vanilla-Type
There is one seperate manhole behind Angeline's Aromatics which is used as hidden escape from solitude-jail. I havent't touch this manhole so it is still using the vanilla-manhole or vanilla-texture-replacer-MOD (i use the smanhole.dds / smanhole_n.dds from [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/33370]this MOD[/url]).


If manhole-MODs contain any meshes (maybe for parallax like pfuscher's) you must ignore them and use only the textures for my MOD!


All Manhole-MODs on the nexus: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/searchresults/?quicksrc_name=manhole&quicksrc_auth=Author&quicksrc_game=110]Link[/url]
author: mikraemer
